title: Badjelly
overview: Based on the beloved kids' book, Badjelly the Witch: A Fairy Story, an irreverent modern fairy tale by renowned Irish comedian, poet, playwright and actor, Spike Milligan, Badjelly delivers a fresh new take for today's kids on this classic story, all the while preserving the crazy humour, bizarre situations and quirky characters from Milligan's original tale that has entertained kids for generations.
